official_title: A concurrent resolution in commemoration of the 30th anniversary of the unanimous decision of the Supreme Court of the United States in Brown v. Board of Education.

summary.text: Praises the decision of the Supreme Court in Brown v. Board of Education, invalidating the doctrine of "separate but equal." Designates May 17, 1984, as a national day of commemoration of that decision.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution in commemoration of the 30th anniversary of the unanimous decision of the Supreme Court of the United States in Brown v. Board of Education.
